name: meridian-ux
description: Enterprise web components based on Ant Design principles. Framework-agnostic, accessible, and built with Lit.

scripts.docs:generate: node scripts/generate-docs-data.js && node scripts/generate-component-pages.js && cp -r docs/src/styles docs/public/ && cp -r docs/src/scripts docs/public/ && cp -r docs/src/data docs/public/ && mkdir -p docs/src/vendor && cp -r packages/components/dist/* docs/src/vendor/
scripts.docs:build: yarn build && yarn docs:generate && yarn workspace @meridian-ux/docs build
